name: slushpool
description: Xbar (formerly known as Bitbar) Plugin to monitor Slushpool mining account. The sample API key is read-only and likely may not work so be sure to create your own from your Slushpool account. This Plugin take advantage of the [Slushpool APIs](https://help.slushpool.com/en/support/solutions/articles/77000433512-api-configuration-guide) to provide information about Pool, User Profile, or Worker Stats. Instruction on how to generate your Access Key is provided in the aforementioned guide.
